sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' function WeatherDetails( {temp, humidity, pressure, weatherType, name, speed, country, sunset} ) { const [weatherState, setweatherState]=useState(""); return (
{temp}°
{weatherType}
{name}, {country}
{new Date().toLocaleString()}

{sunset} PM
Sunset

{humidity}
Humidity

{pressure}
Pressure

{speed}
Speed

) } export default WeatherDetails
